title: Implement automated unit test execution
description: Create a streamlined testing framework that automatically runs unit tests on code changes and provides clear pass/fail feedback to developers
iWant: automated unit test execution with immediate feedback
soThat: I can catch bugs within 30 seconds of making code changes
acceptanceCriteria: Tests execute automatically when code files are saved
Test results display within 30 seconds of code changes
Failed tests show specific error messages and line numbers
